title: President Trump weighs in on Jay Jones' 'two bullets to the head' text message
shortDescription: President Donald Trump joined in on Sunday morning calling Jay Jones "Radical Left Lunatic" in a post on Truth Social.

title: Trump’s Portland troop order blocked
shortDescription: Federal judge halts President Donald Trump’s National Guard deployment to Portland for the second time amid protests.

title: Trump urges Democrat Jay Jones to drop out of Virginia's AG race
shortDescription: The reported texts come to light at a time when a poll found that most Americans believe brash political rhetoric is contributing to violence.

title: Trump supports 'across-the-board pay raises' for U.S. military members
shortDescription: Trump's speech took place amid a government shutdown as military personnel work without pay and thousands of federal employees are furloughed.

title: US judge blocks Trump from sending any National Guard troops to Portland, Oregon
shortDescription: Gov. Gavin Newsom previously said he would sue the Trump administration over the deployment of 300 California National Guard personnel to Oregon.

title: Federa layoffs will start if Trump decides shutdown talks aren't moving, aide says
shortDescription: The Trump administration will start mass layoffs for federal workers if the president decides negotiations to end a government shutdown are "absolutely going nowhere," a top White House aid said.

title: The nuclear war of shutdowns: Trump targets federal jobs, grants
shortDescription: You call this governing? Some of the incentives for Trump and congressional Democrats are to fight, not compromise.

title: Trump warns of 'complete obliteration' if Hamas stays in power in Gaza
shortDescription: President Donald Trump warned of “complete obliteration” if the Palestinian militant group Hamas insisted on staying in power in Gaza.

title: Trump-appointed judge blocks National Guard deployment to Portland
shortDescription: The ruling is a setback for Trump who wants to send the military into cities against the wishes of their Democratic leaders.

title: Illinois gov says Trump admin. plans to federalize the National Guard
shortDescription: Trump had been saying since August that Chicago would be next in line after he deployed 800 National Guard troops in Washington DC.

title: Trump's commerce secretary pours gas on Jeffrey Epstein fire
shortDescription: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick told an interviewer he found Jeffrey Epstein, his next-door neighbor, "gross" when they first met in 2005.
